translations.av1_nvenc.hardware.computecapability._de: The version of the Compute Capability features.
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.preset._description: Processing time of each frame. Slower values increase the overall video quality but take more time to process.
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.strategy._description: The encoding mode to use. Choose Constant Bitrate (CBR), Constant Quantizer (CQP) or Variable Bitrate (VBR) and if two encoding passes should be used (VBR only).
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.strategy.cqp._descrip: Quality level of the video. Lower values mean better quality but increase file size and processing time.
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.strategy.bitrate._des: The data rate allowed by the encoder.
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.strategy.maxrate._des: Higher value can improve maximum quality, but increases decoder requirements.
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.strategy.cq._descript: Set target quality level (0 to 51, 0 means automatic).
translations.av1_nvenc.frames.rclookahead._descriptio: Sets the number of frames to use for ratecontrol and lookahead. Higher value means better quality and increased precision.
translations.av1_nvenc.frames.noscenecut._description: When lookahead is enabled, set this to 1 to disable adaptive I-frame insertion at scene cuts.
translations.av1_nvenc.frames.forcedidr._description: If forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames.
translations.av1_nvenc.frames.nonrefp._description: Enables automatic insertion of non-reference P-frames.
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.qpi._description: Enable to change quantization parameter for I-frames.
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.qpp._description: Enable to change quantization parameter for P-frames.
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.qpb._description: Enable to change quantization parameter for B-frames.
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.qp_cb_offset._descri: Quantization parameter offset for cb channel (from -12 to 12) (default 0)
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.qp_cr_offset._descri: Quantization parameter offset for cr channel (from -12 to 12) (default 0)
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.spatialaq._descripti: Choose AQ Mode how available bits should be distributed between all macroblocks in the video.
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.temporalaq._descript: Choose AQ Mode how available bits should be distributed between all macroblocks in the video.
translations.av1_nvenc.misc.level._description: Constrains encoding parameters such as bitrate range and maximum frame size.
translations.av1_nvenc.misc.surfaces._description: Blockcount of memory allocated for bitmap rendering.
translations.av1_nvenc.misc.zerolat._description: Indicate zero latency operation (no reordering delay).
translations.filter.atrim.standard.start._description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be passed
translations.filter.atrim.standard.end._description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be dropped again
translations.filter.atrim.standard.start_sample._desc: Number of the first audio sample that should be passed to the output
translations.filter.atrim.standard.end_sample._descri: Number of the first audio sample that should be dropped again
translations.filter.bwdif.standard.parity._descriptio: Specify the assumed picture field parity
translations.filter.colorspace.advanced.fast._descrip: Do a fast conversion, which skips gamma/primary correction. This will take significantly less CPU, but will be mathematically incorrect. To get output compatible with that produced by the colormatrix filter, use fast=1.
translations.filter.crop.advanced.x._description: Set the crop area x offset
translations.filter.crop.advanced.y._description: Set the crop area y offset
translations.filter.decimate.standard.cycle._descript: Set the number of frame from which one will be dropped
translations.filter.decimate.advanced.blockx._descrip: Set the size of the x-axis blocks used during metric calculations
translations.filter.decimate.advanced.blocky._descrip: Set the size of the y-axis blocks used during metric calculations
translations.filter.decimate.advanced.ppsrc._descript: Mark main input as a pre-processed input and activate clean source input stream
translations.filter.decimate.advanced.chroma._descrip: Set whether or not chroma is considered in the metric calculations
translations.filter.eq.standard.contrast._description: Set the contrast expression. The value must be a float value in range -1000.0 to 1000.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.brightness._descripti: Set the brightness expression. The value must be a float value in range -1.0 to 1.0. The default value is 0.
translations.filter.eq.standard.saturation._descripti: Set the saturation expression. The value must be a float in range 0.0 to 3.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.gamma._description: Set the gamma expression. The value must be a float in range 0.1 to 10.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.gamma_r._description: Set the gamma expression for red. The value must be a float in range 0.1 to 10.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.gamma_g._description: Set the gamma expression for green. The value must be a float in range 0.1 to 10.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.gamma_b._description: Set the gamma expression for blue. The value must be a float in range 0.1 to 10.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.gamma_weight._descrip: Set the gamma weight expression. It can be used to reduce the effect of a high gamma value on bright image areas, e.g. keep them from getting overamplified and just plain white. The value must be a float in range 0.0 to 1.0. A value of 0.0 turns the gamma correction all the way down while 1.0 leaves it at its full strength. Default is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.eval._description:
Set when the expressions for brightness, contrast, saturation and gamma expressions are evaluated. It accepts the following values:

Init - only evaluate expressions once during the filter initialization or when a command is processed

Frame - evaluate expressions for each incoming frame

Default value is Init.
translations.filter.hqdn3d.standard.luma_spatial._des: A non-negative floating point number which specifies spatial luma strength. It defaults to 4.0.
translations.filter.hqdn3d.standard.chroma_spatial._d: A non-negative floating point number which specifies spatial chroma strength. It defaults to 3.0*luma_spatial/4.0.
translations.filter.hqdn3d.standard.luma_tmp._descrip: A floating point number which specifies luma temporal strength. It defaults to 6.0*luma_spatial/4.0.
translations.filter.hqdn3d.standard.chroma_tmp._descr: A floating point number which specifies chroma temporal strength. It defaults to luma_tmp*chroma_spatial/luma_spatial.
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._descript: Set mode for the first plane.
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_1: 1 - Clips the pixel with the minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_2: 2 - Clips the pixel with the second minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_3: 3 - Clips the pixel with the third minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_4: 4 - Clips the pixel with the fourth minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels. This is equivalent to a median filter
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_5: 5 - Line-sensitive clipping giving the minimal change
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_7: 9 - Line-sensitive clipping on a line where the neighbours pixels are the closest
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_8: 10 - Replaces the target pixel with the closest neighbour
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_10: 13 - Bob mode, interpolates top field from the line where the neighbours pixels are the closest
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_11: 14 - Bob mode, interpolates bottom field from the line where the neighbours pixels are the closest
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_12: 15 - Bob mode, interpolates top field. Same as 13 but with a more complicated interpolation formula
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_13: 16 - Bob mode, interpolates bottom field. Same as 14 but with a more complicated interpolation formula
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_14: 17 - Clips the pixel with the minimum and maximum of respectively the maximum and minimum of each pair of opposite neighbour pixels
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_15: 18 - Line-sensitive clipping using opposite neighbours whose greatest distance from the current pixel is minimal
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_16: 19 - Replaces the pixel with the average of its 8 neighbours
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_17: 20 - Averages the 9 pixels ([1 1 1] horizontal and vertical blur)
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_18: 21 - Clips pixels using the averages of opposite neighbour
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_19: 22 - Same as mode 21 but simpler and faster
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_20: 23 - Small edge and halo removal, but reputed useless
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._descript: Set mode for the second plane.

translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_3: 3 - Clips the pixel with the third minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_4: 4 - Clips the pixel with the fourth minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels. This is equivalent to a median filter

translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_7: 9 - Line-sensitive clipping on a line where the neighbours pixels are the closest

translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_10: 13 - Bob mode, interpolates top field from the line where the neighbours pixels are the closest
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_11: 14 - Bob mode, interpolates bottom field from the line where the neighbours pixels are the closest
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_12: 15 - Bob mode, interpolates top field. Same as 13 but with a more complicated interpolation formula
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_13: 16 - Bob mode, interpolates bottom field. Same as 14 but with a more complicated interpolation formula
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_14: 17 - Clips the pixel with the minimum and maximum of respectively the maximum and minimum of each pair of opposite neighbour pixels
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_15: 18 - Line-sensitive clipping using opposite neighbours whose greatest distance from the current pixel is minimal
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_16: 19 - Replaces the pixel with the average of its 8 neighbours
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_17: 20 - Averages the 9 pixels ([1 1 1] horizontal and vertical blur)
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m1._item_18: 21 - Clips pixels using the averages of opposite neighbour

translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m2._descript: Set mode for the third plane.
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m2._item_1: 1 - Clips the pixel with the minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels

translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m2._item_4: 4 - Clips the pixel with the fourth minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels. This is equivalent to a median filter
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m2._item_5: 5 - Line-sensitive clipping giving the minimal change
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m2._item_7: 9 - Line-sensitive clipping on a line where the neighbours pixels are the closest
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m2._item_8: 10 - Replaces the target pixel with the closest neighbour

translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m2._item_17: 20 - Averages the 9 pixels ([1 1 1] horizontal and vertical blur)

translations.filter.unsharp.standard.luma_msize_x._de: Set the luma matrix horizontal size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.luma_msize_y._de: Set the luma matrix vertical size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.luma_amount._des: Set the luma effect strength. It must be a floating point number, reasonable values lay between -1.5 and 1.5. Negative values will blur the input video, while positive values will sharpen it, a value of zero will disable the effect.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.chroma_msize_x._: Set the chroma matrix horizontal size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.chroma_msize_y._: Set the chroma matrix vertical size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.chroma_amount._d: Set the chroma effect strength. It must be a floating point number, reasonable values lay between -1.5 and 1.5. Negative values will blur the input video, while positive values will sharpen it, a value of zero will disable the effect.
